value_dict.False: The car is not a SUV

value_dict.False: The car is not a pickup

msrp.description: The manufacturer suggested retail price of the car in dollars

dealer_cost.description: The cost of the car for the dealer in dollars

eng_size.description: The size of the engine in liters

ncyl.description: The number of cylinders in the engine

city_mpg.description: The fuel economy in the city in miles per gallon

hwy_mpg.description: The fuel economy on the highway in miles per gallon

weight.description: The weight of the car in pounds

wheel_base.description: The wheel base of the car in inches

length.description: The length of the car in inches

width.description: The width of the car in inches
